Method Detail

parse

public Table parse(java.lang.String csv,
                   boolean hasTitles)
Parses the given string as a table in CSV format and returns the corresponding table object.

Parameters:
csv - the CSV file content as a string
hasTitles - Set to true to indicate that the first row should be interpreted as titles. Otherwise, the columns will be named col1...colN
Returns:
The parsed table
